nodes.text: @MagicMarguerite I remember when starbucks took their stores back from Magic. He was just the black face to get black people in the door.
@barringtonmack Nobody said nothing about that either. They had Magic smiling with a Starbucks cup in hand at all the Starbucks in the urban areas. And then he disappeared and nobody missed a beat 🤣

Everybody’s talking about it. The decadent veil is dissipating before our eyes. Ain’t no Black wealth. Aspiring to be like Black celebrities won’t close the racial wealth gap. #Reparations #PastDue #ADOS https://t.co/B9A2t6kDkB
@MagicMarguerite Mr. Shaq has a bizness partnership w/Papa John's Pizza.  The profits from a current promotion goes to "communities."  Anyone know what "communities" mean?
@LouisHThomasJr1 @MagicMarguerite I don’t eat that shit and would never support it so I don’t care cuz it ain’t benefiting me.
@MagicMarguerite I tweeted out to him last year. No response, but he knows about #ADOS .
@MagicMarguerite If that ain't the truth, then I don't know what is, Word UP.
